title: Math and Programming for Business Analytics
description: Success in business analytics (data science for business) requires a solid foundation in mathematics, statistics, and programming. This course is designed to enhance students’ ability to solve problems relevant for their future profession. We will build up skills and instill confidence so students can tackle any new data or analytics problems they might face. We teach students to use math and programming to create analytics solutions to important business problems and enjoy the process. Prerequisites: restricted to MS in business analytics students or instructor approval or department approval.
